# GMan - GTK# Man Page Viewer

A C# GTK# application for viewing Unix man pages in X11 environments.

## File structure
- `MainWindow.cs` - This is the main window logic
- `Program.cs` - Program entry point. 
- `README.md` - Readme file targeted at normal users.
- `README-DEV.md` - Technical readme file targeted for other developers who might want to contribute

## Project Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md created
- [x] Set up .NET 8 C# project with GTK# bindings
- [ ] Add necessary dependencies
- [ ] Create application UI
- [ ] Build and test
- [ ] Documentation complete

## Tech Stack
- Language: C#
- Framework: .NET 8 LTS
- UI: GTK# (GtkSharp)
- Platform: X11/Linux
